revised_title: Observations on the Causes of Tertian Fevers in Minorca
tldr: The author, Alexander Small, examines the causes of tertian fevers in Minorca, attributing them to a combination of factors including excessive watering of gardens, putrid vapors from decomposing vegetation, and damp, cold stone surfaces in houses. He suggests remedies for these issues, such as proper drainage and better gardening practices.
